channel.title: The KiKi
channel.description:
to laugh; to get the scoop; to cause mischief, these are definitions of the slang word . This show is for the eccentric, as well as, the , from acid house to zydeco. Expect artists such as Prince, Roy Orbison, Arctic Monkeys, Disocdeine, Stacy Lattisaw, Nina Simone, Abe Vigoda, Felix Mendelssohn, and James Blake, among millions of others! We mix it up, spray paint it, spin it, and slide it to you. So now that you have a visual of The KiKi....it's time for audio penetration*
Marcus White Aviance likesThe KIKICreate your Like Badge

item.title: a-po-ca lyp-tic
item.description: today while walking down the street I bumped into a total stranger who struck up a conversation about the book of Revelations and the brainwashing of humankind. She imparted me with much wisdom. God is everywhere and although people's eyes are opening slowly.... we are WAKING UP! LET JAH BE PRAISED.

item.title: .....TRANSferring u 2 your casewerKer
item.description: Transferring you to your casewerker....in the sky, goes beyond the phone. I was on tele with my attorney earlier today, discussing some disgusting legal issues. WOW! Who knew life was so mysterious?! I'm giving up on the concept of "right" and "wrong". Now it's all about "moves"! Which direction does____________ go in next? U decide what works, and when you can't decide, you can always ring your Casewerker. Aiight! xxoo MWA http://facebook.com/thekikiradioshow

item.title: Glory_hole
item.description: A glory hole (also spelled gloryhole and glory-hole) is a hole in a wall, or other partition, often between public lavatory stalls or adult video arcade booths for people to engage in sexual activity or observe the person in the next cubicle while one or both parties masturbate.[1] The partition maintains anonymity. Body parts including fingers, tongue and penis may be used for anonymous oral, vaginal and/or anal intercourse. Erotic literature and pornographic films have been devoted to the sexual uses of glory holes.[2][3]
item.dc:creator: MWA
item.itunes:summary: A glory hole (also spelled gloryhole and glory-hole) is a hole in a wall, or other partition, often between public lavatory stalls or adult video arcade booths for people to engage in sexual activity or observe the person in the next cubicle while one or both parties masturbate.[1] The partition maintains anonymity. Body parts including fingers, tongue and penis may be used for anonymous oral, vaginal and/or anal intercourse. Erotic literature and pornographic films have been devoted to the sexual uses of glory holes.[2][3]

item.title: Checkin' the Gate
item.description: this episode makes me feel like candy grows on trees.......fruition is in the air. i'm pretty sure that bitch God put me here to play many roles. but thats all they are....roles....or rolls( if u HUGE)! Just sayin'...why not?....Nell Carter was. And she's dead now...RIP big sister big gurl....i know u Checkin the Pearly Gates. Now....to all u still kickin' on planet Earth, do a high kick for me!
